con:request.name: create script instance
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket}">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script;			
			import java.util.Map;
			import java.math.BigDecimal;
			import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
			import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
			import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
			import org.meveo.model.BusinessEntity;
			import org.slf4j.Logger;
			import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
			public class CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket} extends Script {
			  	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket}.class);
				public void execute(Map<String,Object> context, User user) throws BusinessException{
					log.debug("CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket} called");
				    }
			}
		   ]]>
            </script>
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create offer

con:testCase.name: Generate Invoice in GUI and Verify RT

con:testStep.name: Process to GenerateInvoice in GUI
con:testStep.con:description: - Go Into Administration >>Jobs >> Job Instances : 1- Execute RR-Job 2- Execute M-Job 3- Execute U-Job 4- Execute RT-Job - Go Into Invoicing >>Billing Run >> Create Global Run : 5- Create BillingRun with billingCycle= CYC_INV_MT_1, type=Automatic, InvoiceDate=01/04/2016 and LastTransactionDate=01/03/2016 - Go Into Administration >>Jobs >> Job Instances : 6- Execute Inv-Job - Go Into Invoicing >>Billing Run >> Billing Runs : 7- validate PostInvoicing Report - Go Into Administration >>Jobs >> Job Instances : 8- Execute Inv-Job

con:config.con:expectedResult: - Into Invoicing >>Rated Transactions : Verify the Rated Transaction

con:request.name: createInvoice
con:request.con:request: ${#TestSuite#ticket}_BA 2016-06-06 2016-06-06 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_TEST-Type ${#TestSuite#ticket}_IC CAT my descccc My SUB Desc 100 20 120 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_ISubC 2016-05-06 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 codemONcode My new desc unit ${#TestSuite#ticket}_PP_REC1 2016-05-06 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 codemONcode My new desc uuit ${#TestSuite#ticket}_PP_REC1 My SUB desc outout 0 0 0 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_ISubC 2016-05-06 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 codemONcode My new desc uit ${#TestSuite#ticket}_PP_REC1 2016-05-06 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 codemONcode my nex desc uit ${#TestSuite#ticket}_PP_REC1 true false false DETAILLED

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateCalendar> <calendar code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_CALENDAR_WEEK"> <description>WEEK Calendar</description> <calendarType>YEARLY</calendarType> <days day="1" month="MAY"/> <days day="8" month="MAY"/> <days day="15" month="MAY"/> <days day="22" month="MAY"/> <days day="30" month="MAY"/> <days day="1" month="JUNE"/> <days day="8" month="JUNE"/> <days day="15" month="JUNE"/> <days day="22" month="JUNE"/> <days day="30" month="JUNE"/> </calendar> </ws:createOrUpdateCalendar> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create usageCharge
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createUsageChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <usageChargeTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_USG1" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_USG1" disabled="false"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <!--Optional:--> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <priority>1</priority> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test ${#ticket}</description> </languageDescriptions> <!--Optional:--> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <ratingUnitDescription>Quantity</ratingUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <unitMultiplicator>2</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> </usageChargeTemplate> </ws:createUsageChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create offer
con:request.con:request: false MONTHLY ${#TestSuite#ticket}_REC1

con:request.name: registerCdrList
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:registerCdrList> <!--Optional:--> <cdrList> <!-- charge 40,no notification , counter value =20--> <cdr>2016-05-1T00:00:00Z;40;${#TestSuite#ticket}_access1;param1;param2;param3;param4;param5;param6;param7;param8;param9;2016-01-01T00:00:00Z;2016-02-01T00:00:00Z;2016-03-01T00:00:00Z;2016-04-01T00:00:00Z;2016-05-01T00:00:00Z;44;20;666;77;12</cdr> <!-- charge 60 and fire notification -> counter value=0 --> <cdr>2016-05-8T00:00:00Z;60;${#TestSuite#ticket}_access1;param1;param2;param3;param4;param5;param6;param7;param8;param9;2016-01-01T00:00:00Z;2016-02-01T00:00:00Z;2016-03-01T00:00:00Z;2016-04-01T00:00:00Z;2016-05-01T00:00:00Z;44;20;666;77;12</cdr> <!-- charge 40,no notification , counter value =20 --> <cdr>2016-05-15T00:00:00Z;40;${#TestSuite#ticket}_access1;param1;param2;param3;param4;param5;param6;param7;param8;param9;2016-01-01T00:00:00Z;2016-02-01T00:00:00Z;2016-03-01T00:00:00Z;2016-04-01T00:00:00Z;2016-05-01T00:00:00Z;44;20;666;77;12</cdr> </cdrList> </ws:registerCdrList> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: execute UsageRatingJob and fire notification when counterPeriod value =0

con:request.name: execute UsageRatingJob and fire notification when counterPeriod value =0
